node.description: Root Page - desctription text.
Move AutoSampler 50mm to the right (away from wash port).
Follow the instructions in the manual to replace septum.
Please wait.
Please confirm the wash port calibration of the AutoSampler.
Pump IPA to cleaning port for 30 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, S2, AS open).
Is liquid visible in the port?
Dry the wash port using compressed air and lint-free wipes.
Lower AutoSampler into the wash port, dry the path, and then return the AutoSampler to its home position.
Dry L4 path for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Move the test syringe plunger forward. Dry L3 path(backside cleaning) for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Proceed to the next step in the diagnostic test or start of job.
Carefully reinstall septum, making sure it is securely pressed into place.
Please confirm the wash port calibration of the AutoSampler.
Pump IPA to cleaning port for 30 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, S2, AS open).
Is liquid visible in the port?
Dry the wash port using compressed air and lint-free wipes.
Lower AutoSampler into the wash port, dry the path, and then return the AutoSampler to its home position.
Dry L4 path for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Move the test syringe plunger forward. Dry L3 path(backside cleaning) for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Proceed to the next step in the diagnostic test or start of job.
Please replace septum or contact RheoSense for assistance. (service@rheosense.com, 925.866.3801x2)
Lower AutoSampler into the wash port, dry the path, and then return the AutoSampler to its home position.
Dry L4 path for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Move the test syringe plunger forward. Dry L3 path(backside cleaning) for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Proceed to the next step in the diagnostic test or start of job.
Contact RheoSense for assistance. (service@rheosense.com, 925.866.3801x2)
Please replace septum or contact RheoSense for assistance. (service@rheosense.com, 925.866.3801x2)
Lower AutoSampler into the wash port, dry the path, and then return the AutoSampler to its home position.
Dry L4 path for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Move the test syringe plunger forward. Dry L3 path(backside cleaning) for 20 seconds (P-source 4095; A4, A3, DS, L3, L4 open).
Proceed to the next step in the diagnostic test or start of job.
Contact RheoSense for assistance. (service@rheosense.com, 925.866.3801x2)
